headline: Why this analyst still likes shopping center stocks
summary: There have been some concerns about consumer spending slowing, which could pose an issue for properties such as shopping centers. In the video above, Mizuho Americas senior REIT and homebuilders analyst Haendel St. Juste shares why he still likes the space and gives his top stock pick. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here.
